entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 30 percent chance of rain or snow in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
